description: bpE University presents a crisp Delta Training for Process Designers that will help you to use ARIS 9 successfully. In 7 Lectures of about ten minutes lenght each you will learn how to use all new features efficiently, based on your knowledge of older ARIS versions. ARIS 9 is the latest process design platform provided by Software AG. Compared to previous ARIS versions, ARIS 9 increases convenience in use and helps you to improve your processes.
title: ARIS 9 Delta Training for Process Designers
